channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 11:41 pursuit of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 11:41 pursuit of anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
